countries.name: Japan
countries.culture: Traditional and modern; rich in customs like tea ceremonies, festivals, and martial arts
countries.landscape: Mountainous terrain with famous landmarks such as Mount Fuji and cherry blossom gardens

countries.name: France
countries.culture: Renowned for art, fashion, and cuisine; historical influence from monarchy to revolution
countries.landscape: Diverse landscapes including the Alps, beaches, and lush wine regions

countries.name: Brazil
countries.culture: Colorful and festive with influences from indigenous, African, and Portuguese heritage; famous for Carnival
countries.landscape: Home to the Amazon rainforest, beaches, and landmarks like Christ the Redeemer

countries.name: Canada
countries.culture: Multicultural; blend of indigenous, French, and British influences
countries.landscape: Forests, lakes, mountains, and cold tundras; notable spots like the Rockies and Niagara Falls

countries.name: Kenya
countries.culture: Known for Maasai and Swahili traditions; vibrant music and dance
countries.landscape: Savannahs, highlands, and wildlife reserves like Maasai Mara

countries.name: Australia
countries.culture: Diverse influences; indigenous art and European-inspired lifestyle
countries.landscape: Deserts, coral reefs like the Great Barrier Reef, beaches, and the Outback

countries.name: India
countries.culture: Rich traditions in spirituality, arts, and festivals; renowned for yoga and Bollywood
countries.landscape: Himalayas, forests, and extensive river plains

countries.name: China
countries.culture: Ancient traditions with calligraphy, cuisine, and philosophy; Confucianism and Taoism
countries.landscape: Mountains, rivers, deserts, and urban landscapes with landmarks like the Great Wall

countries.name: Russia
countries.culture: Influence from Orthodox Christianity, arts, and literature; unique folk traditions

countries.name: Egypt
countries.culture: Ancient civilization known for pharaohs, hieroglyphics, and pyramids; Islamic influence
countries.landscape: Deserts and the Nile River; iconic pyramids and ancient ruins

countries.name: Germany
countries.culture: Influential in philosophy, music, and engineering; traditions like Oktoberfest
countries.landscape: Forests, rivers, and the Bavarian Alps; Rhine Valley and Black Forest

countries.name: United States
countries.culture: Melting pot with influences from around the world; known for pop culture, sports, and innovation

countries.name: Mexico

countries.landscape: Beaches, mountains, and deserts; ancient ruins like Chichen Itza

countries.name: South Africa
countries.culture: Diverse with influences from Zulu, Xhosa, and colonial history; known for music and dance
countries.landscape: Mountains, savannas, and coasts; notable for Table Mountain and safaris

countries.name: Argentina
countries.culture: Strong European influence; birthplace of tango music and dance
countries.landscape: Patagonia, Pampas plains, and Andes mountains; Iguazu Falls

countries.name: Italy
countries.culture: Known for Renaissance art, fashion, and cuisine like pasta and pizza
countries.landscape: Coastal regions, vineyards, and historic cities like Rome and Venice

countries.culture: Rich in literary history, music, and monarchy traditions
